content: Bill: Can we give it to LaVar Ball one year early? Did you ever think an NBA dad would be battling Stephen A. on First Take? Starting next season, LaVar Ball is locking up this award like The Daily Show locked up that decade of Outstanding Variety Show Emmys. Might as well give him one early. Honorable mention: Dennis Schröder’s mom, Austin Rivers, LeBron James Jr., Wanda Durant, Dwyane Wade’s ex-wife.
